languages.text: {n}Склонив голову и пробормотав молитву, Паскаль делает краткое движение пальцами, и несколько огоньков на когитаторе гаснет, а оборона его покрывается трещинами.{/n} "Прости, древний дух. Ты должен быть усмирен".

{n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick motion with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out as its defences crack.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."
languages.original_text: {n}Склонив голову и пробормотав молитву, Паскаль делает краткое движение пальцами, и несколько огоньков на когитаторе гаснет, а оборона его покрывается трещинами.{/n} "Прости, древний дух. Ты должен быть усмирен".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick movement with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out, and cracks run through its defences.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."

{n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick motion with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out as its defences crack.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."

{n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick motion with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out as its defences crack.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal inclina la cabeza y murmura una plegaria y después hace un movimiento rápido con los dedos. Varias luces del cogitador se apagan al quebrarse sus defensas.{/n} «Lo siento, venerable espíritu, pero debo pacificarte».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick motion with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out as its defences crack.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal inclina la cabeza y murmura una plegaria y después hace un movimiento rápido con los dedos. Varias luces del cogitador se apagan al quebrarse sus defensas.{/n} «Lo siento, venerable espíritu, pero debo pacificarte».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal incline la tête et murmure une prière, puis ses doigts font un geste rapide. Plusieurs lumières du cogitateur s'éteignent lorsque ses défenses cèdent.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, esprit ancien. Vous devez être apaisé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick motion with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out as its defences crack.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal incline la tête et murmure une prière, puis ses doigts font un geste rapide. Plusieurs lumières du cogitateur s'éteignent lorsque ses défenses cèdent.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, esprit ancien. Vous devez être apaisé. »

languages.text: {n}パスカルは頭を下げて祈りを唱え、指を素早く動かす。考算機の光がいくつか消え、防衛が解除された。{/n}「古き精霊よ、赦したまえ。鎮まるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick motion with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out as its defences crack.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは頭を下げて祈りを唱え、指を素早く動かす。考算機の光がいくつか消え、防衛が解除された。{/n}「古き精霊よ、赦したまえ。鎮まるのだ」

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡低下头，喃喃祈祷，手指飞速地跳跃着。它的防御系统被攻破了，外壳上的红灯也熄灭了。{/n}“请原谅我，古老的机魂。你必须得到安抚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick motion with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out as its defences crack.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡低下头，喃喃祈祷，手指飞速地跳跃着。它的防御系统被攻破了，外壳上的红灯也熄灭了。{/n}“请原谅我，古老的机魂。你必须得到安抚。”

languages.text: {n}Pasqal neigt den Kopf und murmelt ein Gebet, dann führt er eine schnelle Bewegung mit den Fingern aus. Mehrere Lichter an dem Cogitator erlöschen, als seine Verteidigung Risse bekommt.{/n} "Verzeiht mir, uralter Geist. Ihr müsst befriedet werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick motion with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out as its defences crack.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal neigt den Kopf und murmelt ein Gebet, dann führt er eine schnelle Bewegung mit den Fingern aus. Mehrere Lichter an dem Cogitator erlöschen, als seine Verteidigung Risse bekommt.{/n} "Verzeiht mir, uralter Geist. Ihr müsst befriedet werden."

languages.text: {n}Başını eğen Pasqal, bir dua okuyup ardından parmaklarıyla hızlı bir hareket yapıyor. Savunması aşıldıkça kavramsayardaki ışıkların bazıları sönmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Beni affet kadim ruh. Pasifize edilmen gerek."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows his head and mutters a prayer, then makes a quick motion with his fingers. Several lights on the cogitator go out as its defences crack.{/n} "Forgive me, ancient spirit. You must be pacified."
